function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Measurement error in survey questions or responses","Impact":"Invalid or unreliable data for analysis","Mitigation":"Conduct pilot surveys, use validated survey measures, provide clear instructions","Technologies":"Survey software with built-in validation checks","People":"Researchers, survey participants","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Potential bias in survey responses","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of attitudes and behaviors","Mitigation":"Use randomized response techniques, ensure anonymity, avoid leading or loaded questions","Technologies":"Survey software with randomized response features","People":"Researchers, survey participants","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators"}]}
